70010000091571.description:
Remember when the streets were your playground, where every curb, puddle, or sidewalk became part of an epic mission? Bambas! brings that magic back, offering a sandbox game that lets you relive those carefree adventures with its innovative control system. 

Explore a vibrant Mediterranean coastal city bursting with detail, where creativity knows no bounds and exploration is your ticket to endless fun. Use the controller’s sticks and triggers to move each sneaker independently, mimicking the motion of your own feet. Walking forward isn’t enough—navigate crosswalks, kick cans, balance on curbs, and pull off impossible jumps as you tackle hundreds of challenges and unlock a treasure trove of customisable sneakers. 

Bambas! isn’t just a game—it’s a celebration of urban culture. Break stereotypes with its non-linear narrative and environmental storytelling, where every corner hides tales waiting to be uncovered. Discover hidden spots packed with secrets and meet characters who’ll take you on unexpected journeys. Lace up and step up—because in this game, every stride is an adventure of its own.
70010000091571.intro: Relive your childhood and turn every crosswalk, curb, and puddle into an epic adventure with this urban walking simulator.
70010000091571.name: Bambas!

70010000096401.description:
Embark on an exciting journey where you’ll explore diverse and thrilling locations on your trusty bike, performing amazing stunts and pushing your limits. In each mission, you’ll earn points by pulling off daring tricks, which can be used to unlock new bike models with unique designs and characteristics.

Choose your character and customize their outfit to match your style. Personalize your bike as well — from colors to parts — and stand out in every ride. Whether you’re navigating an urban landscape, an amusement theme park, or even a hazardous radioactive zone, each location offers a fresh adventure filled with challenges and excitement. Expand your capabilities, show off your skills, and leave your mark in the world of extreme cycling. Are you ready to pedal your way to fame?

Key Features:
- Single Player Mode: Take on the adventure solo and enjoy exploring the wide variety of locations.
- Unique Locations: Each environment has its own design, offering a different experience — from city streets and public parks to rooftops and more unexpected terrains.
- Customization: Select your character, choose their clothes, and customize your bike to suit your preferences.
- Physics: Realistic cycling physics demand a perfect balance between speed and control to prevent falls and injuries.
- Store: Spend your stunt-earned points to unlock and try out different bikes, each with its own feel and performance.
- Missions: Every location features a set of missions that challenge you to perform, explore, and earn rewards.
70010000096401.intro: Every bike is a new Adventure. Every stunt a step to glory.
70010000096401.name: BMX CITY RUN

70010000099703.description:
Dungeons Of Paint is a classic top-down shooter inspired by paintball.

Explore dark dungeons, blast baddies, and leave a trail of colourful paint in your artistic path of destruction. Grab different guns, and take down waves of enemies with ricochets of bouncy paint projectiles.

Featuring 5 different dungeons, and 20 different challenges, Dungeons Of Paint is a radiant paintball action-adventure! 


Features
* Top-down shooter gameplay
* 20 challenges to beat
* 5 different dungeons
* Colourful paintball pixel art
* Relaxing electronic music
70010000099703.intro: Can you colour the entire world with a gun?
70010000099703.name: Dungeons of Paint

70010000099990.description:
Step into the glitzy world of high-stakes roulette with Pro Roulette, the ultimate single-player casino experience on Nintendo Switch™. Whether you're a seasoned strategist or a newcomer chasing your first jackpot, Pro Roulette brings the timeless casino classic to life like never before.

– Two classic variants: play both American Roulette with its double zero layout and European Roulette for a more strategic edge
– Great graphics, smooth animations, and immersive sound design capture the real casino feel
– Easy-to-use touch screen controls optimized for handheld mode
– Practice strategies, test your luck, and aim for big virtual payouts with every spin

Whether you're at home or on the go, Pro Roulette gives you a premium roulette experience—anytime, anywhere.

Are you ready to spin and win?
70010000099990.intro: Spin the Wheel. Feel the Thrill.
70010000099990.name: Pro Roulette

70070000025636.description:
The Legends Collection 6-in-1 delivers a diverse gaming experience filled with exciting adventures, creative freedom, and tactical challenges. Whether you're looking to relax, unleash your creativity, or dive into strategic battles - this bundle has something for everyone. Perfect for gamers who crave variety!

HARVEST LIFE: Build your dream farm and lovingly care for adorable animals.

CASTAWAY PARADISE: Explore a tropical island, customize your paradise, and make new friends.

STRANDED SAILS: Discover mysterious islands, grow crops, and unravel hidden secrets.

TOBLA - DIVINE PATH: Solve humorous, physics-based puzzles full of clever twists.

SUPER DUNGEON MAKER: Create and share exciting pixel-art dungeons, or challenge yourself in adventures crafted by the community.

THE FORGOTTEN LAND: Engage in tactical Match-3 battles and lead your heroes to victory.
70070000025636.intro: DIVE INTO SIX THRILLING GAMING HIGHLIGHTS - BUILD FARMS, CONQUER EPIC DUNGEONS, SOLVE CLEVER PUZZLES, AND EMBARK ON FANTASTIC ADVENTURES!
70070000025636.name: Legends Collection 6-in-1

70070000027961.description:
Discover the perfect balance of strategy and skill in Snooker Fever.  This game brings the classic snooker experience to the Nintendo Switch™, whether you're a seasoned snooker player or just picking up a cue for the first time.

With 10 beautifully crafted tables, customizable cues, and CPU opponents that keep you on your toes, every game feels fresh. Take on the challenge solo or invite a friend for some local competition. Focus on sinking that perfect shot, while the stunning 3D visuals capture the atmosphere of a real snooker hall.

Snooker Fever has all the tools you need to master the game, enjoy some friendly competition, and just have a great time.

Key Features:

10 different tables 
15 custom cues 
3 levels of opponents
Local multiplayer 
Smooth controls and realistic 3D graphics

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #1 and Expansion Pack #3 with:

10 stunning new table designs
70070000027961.intro: The classic pool experience, right at home!
70070000027961.name: Snooker Fever Superior Edition

70010000098703.description:
Get ready for action with a vacuum so strong, even the laws of physics are nervous. Suck up everything in sight—boxes, animals, enemies… basically, if it’s not bolted down, it’s going in!

But that’s just the beginning. At the end of each level, it’s payback time! Fire everything you’ve collected straight at bosses, towers, and anything unlucky enough to stand in your way. It’s not personal. It’s vacuum justice.

Dodge obstacles, suck shiny gems, and unlock new vacuum styles that prove cleaning up can look cool too. The more you suck, the more fun it gets!

Features:
• Suck It All In – Enemies, crates... even elephants! This vacuum breaks records, physics, and probably warranty terms.
• Epic Boss Fights – Giant enemies. Flying objects. Extreme chaos. Maximum satisfaction.
• Smash Castles – No catapult? No problem. Your vacuum launches stuff like a pro.
• Fun Skins – Vacuums shaped like gadgets, tools, or total mysteries. Is that one made of scrap? Maybe. Why not.

Nothing is safe from the Super Sucker! Seriously. Hide your stuff.
70010000098703.intro: Suck it all in… then launch it like a maniac with a cannon!
70010000098703.name: Super Sucker

70050000058743.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock 3 new skins:
- Toxic vacuum
- Steam vacuum
- Engine vacuum

They’re heavy, high-tech, and built to fire with maximum precision. Blasting stuff has never looked so serious.
70050000058743.intro: Clear the way with brand new suckers!
70050000058743.name: Super Sucker: Smart DLC

70050000058745.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock 3 new skins:
- Cash Register vacuum
- Firehose vacuum
- Flowerpot vacuum

They’re colorful, chaotic, and absolutely unqualified for serious work. Blasting stuff has never looked so ridiculous.
70050000058745.intro: Clear the way with brand new suckers!
70050000058745.name: Super Sucker: Silly DLC

70070000028996.description:
It looks like a normal day at the café… but suddenly, swarms of love-craving cats are storming in, and only you stand between them and total feline chaos! Armed with laser pointers, yarn balls, and even the dreaded pickle of doom, you’ll have to keep these fluffballs at bay while serving your customers their precious coffee. No big deal, right?

Features:
- Face down hordes of fluffy invaders
- Unlock 9 quirky toys and 7 heroic waiters
- Conquer shifts in 3 different café battlegrounds
- Upgrade your waiters and toys to become the strongest cat-wrangler
- Enjoy purr-fectly fun gameplay and cute visuals

Get ready for waves of fur and whiskers as you protect two cozy cafés. Upgrade your toys and special skills to become the best cat-fighting waiter around! With each shift, you’ll unlock new waiters, fun toys, and even more cat-tastrophes!

Can you save your café before the cats take over?
70070000028996.intro: The purr-fect storm is coming! Can you protect your café from fluffy chaos?
70070000028996.name: Sweet Survivors: Funky Edition

70070000028999.description:
Careful - it’s a hot-dog-eat-hot-dog world out there. So fight to the death and push them all till your enemies are oozing Tomato Blood!!

With this edition you will unlock:
- new Burning stage in each local multiplayer mode! 

Wait for the right moment, push the sausage homies in the fire and watch them cook well. Just don't get roasted!

Release to head-bang and push enemy sausages into sausage wars battle obstacles like sharp tools, kitchen sinks, garden fire, or off the counter to their doom. The crowded city is overcrowded and we need to empty it! Try to push them all, fight and smash those sausages to smithereens!

Don’t forget your hot-diggity-dog victory dance at the end of each sausage wars battle level! Make sure you become the biggest wiener in town!
70070000028999.intro: An Epic Sausage Battle till the last drop of ketchup for up to 4 Players and 20 Bots!
70070000028999.name: Sausage Wars: Fire Edition

70010000093873.description:
RememPair – Test Your Memory, Challenge Your Mind!

Put your memory to the test with RememPair! Match pairs—or take it up a notch with groups of three or even four for an extra challenge.

- Play solo or with up to 5 friends & AI opponents (max. 6 players).
- Choose from various card sets – with more sets planned as DLC!
- Pass the controller after each turn – strategy matters!
- Enjoy 43 relaxing tracks with a built-in music player.

Whether you're playing alone or with friends, RememPair is the perfect way to train your brain and have fun!
70010000093873.intro: Remember the uncovered pictures and make identical pairs of 2, 3 or even 4
70010000093873.name: RememPair

70010000096158.description:
Ascendant is a dungeon crawler with heavy Rogue-like elements. You will encounter 3 challenging biome specific enemies types as well as a new boss on every floor! Open soul chests to acquire items with magical attributes. Many of these items synergize with each other to create powerful combinations.

Key Features:
-3 Unique Biomes
-7 Bosses
-30 Enemy Types
-800+ Abilities & Items
70010000096158.intro: Defeat legendary abominations, build-craft unstoppable combinations of enchanted items, investigate an ancient evil, and ascend to freedom!
70010000096158.name: Ascendant

70050000056632.description: Enhance your Remempair experience with this DLC, adding extra card sets to the game! Challenge your memory even further by matching not just pairs, but also triplets or quadruplets. Perfect for those who want to take their memory skills to the next level!
70050000056632.intro:
Remempair – DLC Expansion 
Aditional Card-Set for the Main Game RememPair
70050000056632.name: Animals

70050000057272.description: Enhance your Remempair experience with this DLC, adding extra card sets to the game! Challenge your memory even further by matching not just pairs, but also triplets or quadruplets. Perfect for those who want to take their memory skills to the next level!
70050000057272.intro:
Remempair – DLC Expansion 
Aditional Card-Set for the Main Game RememPair
70050000057272.name: Anime Avatars

70010000087771.description:
RALLY YOUR FRIENDS AND HOLD YOUR GROUND!!!

With up to 4 players, your party must organize the castle, work as a team to craft ammo, and shoot at enemies to protect your kingdom!

PLAN, CRAFT AND DEFEND THE CASTLE!

Use the power of teamwork to prosper through 15 rounds against hordes of brute invaders by preparing the castle stations, reinforcing your defenses each day and choosing the best curveballs for each scenario.

NO HEROES? NO PROBLEM, SAVE THE DAY ANYWAY!

As you journey through this medieval realm, recruit more Non-Heroes to your ragtag band of castle defenders, including familiar faces like the Jester and the Princess, and non-heroic newcomers like the Alchemist and the Doctor. Just because you’re not a hero doesn’t mean that you can’t save the day!

THE KINGDOMS’ FATE IN YOUR HANDS!

Protect three different kingdoms with each their own mechanics, enemies, and quirks. Defend your typical medieval kingdom Noobland, the freezing lands of Trollmeria and the castles overrun by ever-growing mushrooms at Fungaria.

A MEDIEVAL ARSENAL AT YOUR DISPOSAL!

Play in 30 different castles, separated between easy, normal and hard difficulties. Select the kingdom and choose your weapon from cannons, slingshots and even a baby dragon ready to set hordes of enemies on fire!
70010000087771.intro: A group of non-adventurers is the last hope in defending the castle in this chaotic co-op tower defense game with roguelike features.
70010000087771.name: No Heroes Here 2

70010000091088.description:
WELCOME TO DRAGON ECLIPSE!
In Dragon Eclipse, you collect magical Mystlings—unique creatures that enhance your deck and join you in battle. Build your team of three Mystlings with distinct stats, abilities, and special cards. Remember that your beasts grow and evolve as you play, so understanding their nature is the key to victory!
A NEW TWIST ON THE DECK-BUILDING ROGUELITE GENRE
Combine auto-battler mechanics with deck-building strategy for endless creative possibilities. Unlock new Mystlings, cards, and tougher difficulty levels with every run. Experiment with setups, craft complex combos, and elevate your playstyle to unlock tons of fun!
CHOOSE A TAMER
Each Tamer has a distinct playstyle and unique specialization. Which one of them you choose will define the shape of the whole run.
CHOOSE YOUR MYSTLINGS
Every Mystling has unique stats, abilities, and a starting card for your deck. Strategically balance your team, make them your loyal companions, and together, fight against the encroaching evil.
TRAIN AND EVOLVE YOUR MYSTLINGS
Mystlings level up and evolve during combat, gaining powerful new abilities. You’ll have to discover and harness their potential. Sweet and unassuming at first, they can transform into fearsome allies under your guidance.
CREATE YOUR DECK
Throughout your journey, you'll construct a powerful deck full of great combos. Acquire new cards from various sources, engage in battles, and encounter intriguing characters to ensure your deck is tailored to your combat preferences.
TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE
The approaching Eclipse limits your time to gather resources and cards. Not the whole map can be explored. Make decisions to secure victory before it's too late.
Are you ready to become the ultimate Tamer? Start your journey today!
70010000091088.intro: Dragon Eclipse is a roguelite deck-builder with a unique auto-battler twist. Choose your Tamer, team up with powerful Mystlings, and battle fierce foes.
70010000091088.name: Dragon Eclipse

70010000092326.description:
ININ is back with Volume 3 of the IREM Collection, delivering a trio of fantastical shoot 'em ups! This time, it´s magic, machines, and mayhem. 

Mr. Heli (Battle Chopper) 
Meet Mr. Heli, the quirky, legged chopper with a whole lot of firepower! Debuting in Japanese arcades in 1987, this multidirectional “cute ‘em up” shooter lets you pilot through inventive stages filled with puzzle-like maps, hidden paths, and massive bosses. Mine crystals, earn cash, and upgrade your arsenal to keep those rotor blades spinning! 

Mystic Riders 
Magic meets mayhem in Mystic Riders, the 1992 fantasy shooter where you ride broomsticks and battle giant sky turtles, flaming demons, and other mythical creatures. Use your broom as a boomerang to block projectiles, dodge-roll past dangerous hazards, and blast through vibrant worlds. Don't go it alone – team up in local co-op as Mark the wizard or Zeal the witch for an enchanted ride through arcade history. 

Dragon Breed 
Finally, from brooms to dragons – the 1989 arcade gem Dragon Breed throws you into a biomechanical nightmare! Ride into battle on the mighty dragon Bahamoot who can shield you from danger and scorch everything in your path. Think R-Type meets fantasy apocalypse – with wings. 

Features: 
- Three high-fantasy and sci-fi horizontal shoot ‘em ups from IREM. 
- Included Versions: 
- Mr. Heli/Battle Chopper: Arcade (English/Japanese), PC Engine (Japanese) 
-- Mystic Riders: Arcade (English/Japanese) 
-- Dragon Breed: Arcade (Japanese) 
- Optional controller enhancements, including rapid-fire button assignment and customizable control layouts. 
- Quick save/load and built-in rewind to keep the action flowing. 
- Display filters to recreate that original arcade look and feel. 
- Worldwide leaderboards to show off your high-score dominance. 
- Local 2-player co-op in Mystic Riders for magical tag-team action. 
- Packed with bizarre enemies, massive bosses, and legendary gameplay. 

Experience the magic, machines, and mayhem of IREM's arcade brilliance – all in one explosive collection!
70010000092326.intro: Three fantasy horizontal shoot ‘em ups from IREM’s arcade vault – Mr. Heli, Mystic Riders, and Dragon Breed, all in one explosive collection!
70010000092326.name: Irem Collection Volume 3

70010000075647.description:
As the chosen Lightbearer, you are equipped with a lantern fueled by light-bringing ember, allowing you to venture out into the Miasma.
Bring back the lost Knacks and collect resources to rebuild and expand your village!

But be aware, if the ember lantern fades you’ll become lost in Miasma yourself until the next bearer of light finds you…

EXPLORE

• Embark on your journey that starts in the village of the charming Knacks
• Explore an ever-sprawling world full of small adventures and big surprises
• Traverse various biomes in a procedurally generated world with endless replayability
• Discover the scenery hidden by the glooming Miasma which is teeming with life and secrets

ENCOUNTER

• Encounter quirky and mystical creatures
• Support the various inhabitants of the Emberlands and they’ll aid your journey with resources and valuable upgrades to your equipment!
• Keep an eye out for the Knacks that lost their way in the Miasma and guide them safely home to the light of your village

EXPAND

• Rebuild and expand your village to a thriving safe haven for your people!
• Use the resources you gathered to upgrade your village by building new homes and amenities
• Lay the foundation for future adventures, as each new building and vendor will give you a head-start on your next quest
70010000075647.intro: Step into the enchanting world of Into The Emberlands, a cozy exploration game that is all about rebuilding the home of the charming Knacks.
70010000075647.name: Into The Emberlands

70010000089635.description:
Welcome to Fool’s Pub - The Online Multiplayer Card Game.
This isn’t just a card game – it’s an online multiplayer battle where up to four players compete in a high-stakes game of skill, luck, and survival. Outplay your friends or strangers from around the world and prove you’ve got what it takes to be the last one standing.
- First-Person Fun: Experience the game through the eyes of your character, bringing you closer to the action with every draw, bluff, and shot fired.
- Play Your Way: Jump online to challenge others or enjoy offline mode with clever AI opponents when you’re flying solo.
- Cute and Dangerous: Meet adorable characters packing serious heat – their charm hides a fierce determination to win at any cost.
- Rough Rules, Wild Rounds: With Russian roulette-style mechanics, every turn could spell glory or disaster. Will you take the risk or play it safe?
- Only One Wins: In this pub, there’s no second place. Outwit, outplay, and outlast everyone else to claim the ultimate victory.
Get ready for the perfect mix of strategy, adrenaline, and chaos.
Fool’s Pub is calling – are you brave enough to answer?
70010000089635.intro: Have fun, bluff away and play a little trick on your friends!
70010000089635.name: Fool's Pub

70010000092780.description:
Dead of Darkness is a 2D survival horror action-adventure presented in a mix of old-school pixel art and HD character illustrations. In 1985 England, private investigator Miles Windham follows a lead on the mysterious death of his daughter to Velvet Island. But once he arrives on the island, he soon realizes that the residents are behaving strangely and soon Miles finds himself in a struggle for his own survival.

Velvet Island comes to life in grotesque detail as Miles and newfound ally Olivia search Graham Memorial mental hospital and its surrounding facilities. Explore the island in top-down style, carefully manage ammunition, find key items and interact with dozens of unique and memorable characters, all professionally voiced by an international cast.

• Immerse yourself in an atmospheric horror presented in top-down pixel art style!
• Take the roles of Miles and Olivia, each with their own goals and motivations.
• Survive by strategically managing ammunition and other valuable resources!
• Interact with a large cast of fully voiced and memorable characters.
• Enjoy a haunting soundtrack, HD character portraits and meticulously animated sprites!
70010000092780.intro: Survive the horrors of Velvet Island as one man’s past and a young woman’s duty converge to uncover a dangerous truth!
70010000092780.name: Dead of Darkness

70010000096528.description:
Play as one of twelve Console-tan fighters, and battle your friends...or foes!

Face off in one of three multiplayer modes, each offering Standard and Remix game mechanics:

Duel Shock – Lower your opponent's HP! If their HP is all depleted, you win!
Short Fuse – Five rounds, five chances to get the first shot! Who will win the most rounds?
Cash Grab – Collect all the coins you can, or just zap them out of your foe's pockets, but watch out for that time limit!

Or, try your hand at one of eight single-player Challenges. These minigames expand upon the Console-tan lore, and allow players to hone their skills. Ready for something tougher? Super Challenges ramp up the difficulty of our original eight Challenges.

Are you Head-to-Heady?
70010000096528.intro: What happens when two genres become one? Battle Rockets™, that's what happens! In this distinctive "SHMUP Fighter", each player chooses a side–literally!
70010000096528.name: Battle Rockets™

70010000098104.description:
In MISDIE: Into the Game, one wrong tap on your phone pulls you into a world you were never meant to visit. Bright colors and familiar faces quickly give way to something far stranger—and far more dangerous.

Trapped inside a digital dream that shifts into a nightmare, you’ll follow cryptic clues, encounter characters who aren’t quite what they seem, and piece together the truth hidden beneath the surface. Some will offer help. Others will play games of their own. And somewhere, something is always watching.

Blending vibrant anime visuals with a chilling atmosphere, MISDIE: Into the Game is a journey through mystery, memory, and fear. Trust carefully, move quickly, and remember: in this world, nothing stays friendly for long.
70010000098104.intro: A Digital Dream... or Your Worst Nightmare?
70010000098104.name: MISDIE: Into the Game

70010000093021.description: Soar through a breathtaking futuristic world in Aery - Titans of the Future, where nature and technology blend in a mesmerizing landscape. As a graceful bird, you’ll glide effortlessly through high-tech cities, towering robots, and vast mechanical structures, uncovering the mysteries hidden within this advanced world. With smooth and relaxing flight mechanics, you can explore at your own pace, immersing yourself in stunning visuals and a calming atmosphere. Experience a journey of discovery as you navigate through a world shaped by both organic beauty and artificial wonders.
70010000093021.intro: Soar through a futuristic world, glide past robots, and explore high-tech landscapes in Aery - Titans of the Future!
70010000093021.name: Aery – Titans of the Future

70010000095075.description:
"Every night it's the same dream: my own head, mounted on a wall."

While wandering an unfamiliar town, Harvey Green follows a string of paranormal events to a grim realization: his recurring nightmare may foretell an inescapable fate.

In this point-and-click thriller adventure, guide Harvey through the peculiar streets, shops, and surroundings of Villa Ventana as he seeks to prevent his visions from becoming reality.

Features:
• A timeless point-and-click blend of exploration, dialogue, and puzzle-solving
• A curious tale that melds shocking twists with absurd humor
• Dozens of strange, memorable characters brought to life by a cast of celebrated voice actors
• Hand-drawn art that combines 2D and 3D to create striking, "diorama-like" visuals
• An original, haunting score
70010000095075.intro: In this paranormal point-and-click adventure, a traveling salesman races to stop a string of horrific deaths in a quiet seaside town—before he’s next.
70010000095075.name: Slender Threads

70010000095983.description:
Music is the most valuable asset in the world, and hard drives filled with unreleased tracks have been stolen by a gang that wants to monopolize the charts. It's up to you to recover them!

You play as Tina & Tunner — she's the best getaway driver in the hood, he's a sharpshooter with perfect aim. Together, this couple uses their unique talents in high-octane missions, combining action and rhythm in a race against time to save the art that moves the world: music.

Key Features:
- Fast-paced gameplay focused on driving and shootouts
- Vibrant visuals with a strong urban identity
- Original soundtrack by rapper NP Vocal
- Missions full of action, chases, and musical challenges
70010000095983.intro: An action game where a couple races against time to recover stolen music, combining intense shootouts and rhythm-filled chases!
70010000095983.name: Music Drive: Chase the Beat

70010000096804.description:
The objective is to use jumps and dashes to get the crystals on the stage.
The stage is a 3D space with vertical, horizontal and depth. Gravity exists, and players control the player by moving forward, backward, left and right, and by jumping vertically to move the player and aim for the crystal.

Features
・Clear the stage when you get the crystal!
・30 stages in total! There are stages 91 to 120.
・You can choose the difficulty level, and normal is relatively easy to clear. Hard mode is more difficult.
・Some stages have crystals that appear by collecting coins or cutting grass.
・You can get equipment! Get a new weapon, the scythe!
・You can play split-screen with up to 4 people!
・Monsters appear!
・You can use items to use abilities!

Multiplayer
・You can cooperate or compete with everyone.
・Collect coins together,
・Cut grass together
・Clear the stage together.
・Defeat the enemy together!
・Get the crystals first!
70010000096804.intro:
Get the crystals!!
Play in split-screen multiplayer for 1-4 players!
30 stages in total. Normal and hard difficulty levels!
70010000096804.name: CRYKEN part4

70010000097444.description:
■Game System
This is an escape game (riddle solving adventure game).
The game progresses by selecting screens with the cursor and solving various tricks.

■Story
The time of a walk as usual
I decided to take a route that I have not taken for a long time recently.

The vacant lot where I used to play as a child should be in sight soon.

--However, the vacant lot was surrounded by a fence and a large “under construction” sign was blocking the entrance.

I was curious, so I stuck my head through the gap in the fence to take a peek inside.
Immediately I felt the ground jump up.

I picked myself up from the dirt and looked around.
I looked around and saw that it was that vacant lot I had missed so much.
70010000097444.intro:
A puzzle-solving and escape game set in a nostalgic vacant lot where you used to play as a child!
Solve the riddles in the vacant lot and try to escape.
70010000097444.name: Escape Game:The Kitty The Vacant Lot

70010000097938.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Gwangju-si (City), Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
High-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000097938.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Gwangju-si

70010000098157.description:
Poly Bridge 3 is a puzzle game where building bridges is key. Get vehicles to their destination by testing your engineering and problem solving skills. Suspension bridges, draw-bridges, multi-level bridges, crazy almost-bridges, bridges, bridges, bridges!

Explore the new Open World Campaign with a dozen worlds and 150+ new levels. Jumps, Hydraulics, ‘Normal’ Bridges, and more giving you hours of gameplay to enjoy! Take a flying leap in Vaulty Towers or flex those hydraulic muscles in Bifrost Bend!

Let your engineering creativity flow with no restrictions in Sandbox mode, allowing you to push your bridge building skills to the limit.

Challenge yourself with improving your rank on the Leaderboards and check out other player solutions in the Gallery!

Our custom physics engine gives total control, reliability, and accuracy to your bridges. Sleep easy at night knowing your bridges will perform consistently every time!
70010000098157.intro: The best just got better! Rediscover your engineering creativity in this genre-defining bridge engineering and puzzle solving masterpiece.
70010000098157.name: Poly Bridge 3

70010000098754.description:
Life isn’t easy and you’ll feel it in every beat. Stay focused and follow the rhythm to keep each of her organs working properly.

Bad habits in life affect her health. Watch the rhythm carefully and respond before they do real harm.

Life is fragile. One missed beat may lead to illness… or even death. Master every rhythm and guide her to a perfect life. Keep her healthy and whole until the very end.
70010000098754.intro: Hit the beat and watch her journey through life.
70010000098754.name: Beat of Life

70010000099420.description:
This action RPG, released in Japan by Micro Cabin in 1991, is a spin-off starring Fray, a popular character from “Xak.” Unlike the serious tone of the Xak titles, this features a lighthearted and fun adventure.

The game is a top-down action RPG where you can freely explore towns, but in adventure stages, the screen scrolls only upward. You’ll need to use charged attacks and jumping to push forward. Note that the scrolling in adventure scenes is not forced like in shooting games— it scrolls upward only as you move, allowing for a more relaxed play style.


*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000099420.intro: An action RPG featuring Fray, a popular character from the “Xak” series! Enjoy a comical, lighthearted story full of excitement!
70010000099420.name: EGGCONSOLE FRAY PC-9801

70010000100131.description:
Enjoy the world’s most iconic paintings while giving your brain and eyes a fun workout in this artistic game.

How to play is simple:
・Look carefully at the pair of paintings displayed side by side
・Find the differences between the left painting and the right one
・When you spot a difference, tap or click on that part of the right painting!

It’s perfect for a quick break or a bit of casual brain training.

Feeling stuck?
The hint button will gently point you in the right direction
(by showing you roughly where to look)!
70010000100131.intro:
Spot the Differences in Famous Masterpieces!
Train Your Brain and Eyes While Enjoying Art
70010000100131.name: Brain Workout! Find the Difference in Classic Art

70010000100237.description:
Supermarket Manager 2025 hands you the keys to your very own grocery store—and it's up to you to turn it into the neighborhood’s favorite place to shop.

Start with a modest setup and build your way up. Stock shelves, organize the layout, and fine-tune prices to keep customers coming back. As foot traffic grows, expand your space, upgrade your equipment, and keep everything running smoothly.

Hire the right staff, assign roles, and manage the day-to-day chaos of retail life. From clean aisles to long checkout lines, every decision counts.

It’s your store, your strategy, and your shot at building a retail empire—just be ready to answer, “Where’s the bathroom?” at least 47 times a day.
70010000100237.name: Supermarket Manager 2025

70010000100143.description:
Step into the world of high-stakes card play with Pro Blackjack, the ultimate single-player blackjack experience for the Nintendo Switch™.

Enjoy smooth, immersive gameplay that captures the thrill of the casino. Whether you're new to blackjack or a seasoned player, Pro Blackjack offers a clean, focused experience designed for quick sessions or long play.

Play against a smart AI dealer using standard blackjack rules. Make strategic decisions—hit, stand, double down, or split—and aim to get as close to 21 as possible without going bust. With responsive controls and a sleek interface, every hand feels sharp and satisfying.

No pressure, no distractions—just you, the cards, and the strategy it takes to win. Ready to beat the dealer?

Play smart. Play sharp. Become the Pro.
70010000100143.intro: Master the table. Beat the dealer. Play like a pro.
70010000100143.name: Pro Blackjack

70010000095815.description:
The teams at Mighty Yell and 13AM Games have taken one of Atari’s most iconic titles and created a high-pressure, tactical turn-based game where players must manage their pool of defenses strategically to survive rounds of incoming missiles.

Missile Command Delta approaches gameplay in a completely new way, but it retains all the tension and suspense of the arcade original. You have to think strategically about every move you make because even one poor choice can have grave consequences. The turn-based strategy game is wrapped in a twisting, narrative thriller – great for mystery fans, completionists, and players that love to explore and solve puzzles.

Between inbound missile alerts, investigate the underground bunker to access locked rooms, uncover secrets, and strengthen your arsenal. Will you be able to unravel the mystery in time?

FEATURES

- Turn-Based Strategy: A totally unique strategy experience. New missile and enemy types are uncovered when you explore deeper into the bunker.

- Plan Your Defense: Every turn is critical, and one poor choice can spell disaster. Plan your next move, and map out a cascade of explosions that take out multiple enemy missiles to help conserve your resources.

- High-Stakes Mystery: The turn-based strategy game is wrapped in a high-stakes narrative puzzle. Read every document, watch your every step, and ace every puzzle if you want to [REDACTED].

- Experience the Cold War: A claustrophobic retro-future aesthetic of dusty command consoles and supercomputers place you deep into Cold War paranoia.
70010000095815.intro: Missiles are incoming. The stakes are high. Only you can stop the destruction.
70010000095815.name: Missile Command Delta

70070000025387.description:
Pre-purchase and receive:

- Early Access - get the game 3 days early*
- Wireframe Tony Shader

Purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition to skate as the Doom Slayer and rip and tear through a ton of additional content.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

- The Doom Slayer and The Revenant playable skaters, each includes 2 secret moves. The Doom Slayer includes 2 unique outfits and the Unmaykr Hoverboard skate deck.
- Additional songs included with the in-game soundtrack
- Exclusive Doom Slayer, Revenant, and Create-a-Skater skate decks
- Exclusive themed Create-a-Skater Items

Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4. Everything you loved is back, but revamped with more skaters, new parks, gnarlier tricks, eardrum shattering music, plus a whole lot more.

- Reunite the crew with cross-platform online Multiplayer** for up to 8 skaters in new and returning game modes.
- Drop in to new parks or tear it up across the timeless parks from both Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 & Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 4, authentically remade in jaw dropping HD resolution with streamlined goals and the epic 2-minute format.
- Hit ‘em with some drip in the expanded Create-A-Skater and Create-A-Park modes, including the ability to create custom goals to share with friends for the first time ever.
- Shred harder than ever with more challenging goals and an enhanced New Game+ mode.
- Whether you’re a total casual or a grungy pro, the same smooth handling and simple-to-learn controls from Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 will have you shredding like a Pro.

Alert the neighborhood watch and grab your skate buddies because the shred’s not dead. It’s back and better than ever.
70070000025387.intro: Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4.
70070000025387.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 - Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000095657.description:
Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden is a single-player or local co-op adventure that puts you in the shoes of one of two lovable vampire siblings, Flora or Fang, as they embark on a mission to safeguard their dad—the infamous Dracula's—precious pumpkin garden.

- Fight the insect invasion!
Jump, run, spray insects with bug spray, strategically place traps, and coordinate with your co-op partner to repel waves of bothersome bugs in a variety of single screen stages. The vampire gardens future depends on you!

- Play alone or with a friend!

- Place traps and upgrade your gear
Delve into the world of traps and strategy, where earning coins allows you to purchase clever, upgradeable traps that transform the game into a more defensive experience with light tower defense strategies.

- Giant insect bosses
Confront larger-than-life insect bosses in thrilling boss battles that test your skills.
70010000095657.intro: Spray them! Trap them! Collect coins and upgrade your gear! Protect the pumpkin patch from a relentless insect invasion and giant bosses.
70010000095657.name: Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden

70010000097345.description:
Step into the armoured boots of an overzealous knight as you fight across the continent rescuing princesses from monstrous captors in Stormy Knights! Strategic real-time combat ensues as you storm the halls of each castle in side-scrolling pixel art style, from medieval Europe and mystical Persia to feudal Japan and more, all accompanied by an original retro soundtrack!

Slash, dodge, defend and overcome minions like goblins and lizardmen to reach the boss of the castle, and if you emerge victorious, you’ll win the affection of a fair maiden imprisoned within.

Collect valuable golden medals to purchase upgrades across 3 skill trees and stack the deck in your favour for subsequent runs. How long can you keep up this personal crusade as you survive against seemingly impossible odds?

• Slash, dodge and block enemy attacks using your sword and shield!
• Observe enemy tactics and strategically dispatch them in real-time encounters.
• Face off against brutal bosses in each enemy stronghold!
• Collect golden medals to purchase upgrades across 3 skill trees.
• Enjoy a blood-pumping retro soundtrack and fluid pixel art animation!
70010000097345.intro: Save the princesses at all costs as you infiltrate castles filled with treacherous foes!
70010000097345.name: Tiny Pixels Vol. 2 - Stormy Knights

70010000100147.description:
This coloring book is a guarantee of good mood.
In it you can find all kinds of pictures for every taste.
Coloring by numbers with Colorizing is a calming and easy activity for people of all ages. 
This drawing game is suitable for children and adults, everyone can enjoy pixel coloring.
You will definitely love coloring with this beautiful coloring book!
70010000100147.intro: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation
70010000100147.name: Colorizing: Satisfaction

70010000086895.description:
The next chapter in the beloved minimalist city-building franchise is here. ISLANDERS: New Shores invites you back to a world of tranquil creativity, now reimagined with expanded gameplay, stunning visuals, and a host of fresh features that build on the charm of the original. 

Whether you're a longtime fan or a newcomer, prepare to explore, build, and strategise like never before.

Build Your Dream Cities Across 50 Unique Levels
Explore over 44 building types across 6 diverse biomes, each available in 4 vibrant colour variations, letting you customise your strategy and create truly unique cities.

Choose your mode of play; High Score Mode for those who love a competitive twist, or Sandbox Mode to let your creativity run wild.

Experience a World of New Features

Photo Mode - Capture and share your stunning island creations with customisable filters and a turntable camera.

Expanded Soundtrack - Enjoy 75 minutes of original music that sets the perfect mood for your building adventures.

Dynamic Scoring Systems - Master innovative scoring methods - such as line of sight, distance bonuses, and inter-island strategies - to enhance your gameplay.

Boons - Unlock single-use power-ups that give you unique tactical advantages as you progress.

Twitch Integration  - Streamers can now engage their audiences directly with interactive features built into the game.

A Visual Overhaul That Elevates the Experience
With a complete reimagining of the minimalist aesthetic, ISLANDERS: New Shores delivers a visual feast that complements its deep, strategic gameplay. Whether you’re here to relax or to challenge your building skills, every new shore offers a fresh canvas for creativity.

Key Features
- Two modes: High Score and Sandbox (with separate saves)
- 44 unique building types and 7 island properties
- 50 dynamic island generators offering endless variety
- Photo Mode with filters and a turntable camera
- 75 minutes of original, immersive music
- Boons: new one-time power-ups for strategic gameplay
- Advanced scoring systems that reward clever tactics
- Twitch integration for an interactive streaming experience

ISLANDERS: New Shores - where every island is a new adventure, and every build is a chance to create something extraordinary.
70010000086895.name: ISLANDERS: New Shores

70010000086908.description:
Welcome to BAD END THEATER!

Select your protagonist and explore a variety of terrible fates!

The decisions you make in one story will affect the others. You can toggle these behaviors to open up new paths! Unfortunately, every path leads to a bad ending...

Can you find a way to save this unlucky cast?
70010000086908.intro: Select your protagonist and explore a variety of terrible fates!
70010000086908.name: BAD END THEATER

70010000093251.description:
This narrative exploration and platform game inspired by 16-bit aesthetics will take you back to the simplicity and excitement of the classics of that era. There’s a vibrant and dynamic world to explore, and lots of peculiar characters to meet and varied puzzles to solve. Will you discover the secrets hidden in the Everdeep?

As you descend, your decisions determine Shell’s route through the depths, from secret caverns to sprawling underground dwellings.

Encounter characters along the way with unique personalities and, sometimes, optional side quests.

Revel in atmospheric pixel art and an evocative soundtrack, with palettes and musical themes shifting from one location to the next.
70010000093251.intro: An ongoing apocalyptic meteor shower has forced the world’s population to settle underground. As Shell, drill downward through a tile-based underground and discover the Everdeep.
70010000093251.name: Everdeep Aurora

70010000094973.description:
Step into the boots of Ted, a cowboy with a mission: round up runaway piggies using only your wits – and your trusty lasso!

Hogtie is a clever and stylish puzzle game inspired by classic Sokoban mechanics, but with a twist: you can’t push – only pull.


Features:
– Lasso-based puzzle gameplay – Use your rope to pull piggies across desert sands, frosty peaks, and other wild biomes.
– No pushing allowed – Your lasso is the only way to move the pigs, turning classic logic puzzles into something fresh and challenging.
– Style your cowboy – Customize Ted (and his horse!) with a variety of fun, bold outfits – from rugged western wear to fabulous flair.
– Think before you move – Earn stars based on how efficiently you solve each level. Replay puzzles your way: aim for perfection or take your time.


With dozens of hand-crafted levels and plenty of personality, Hogtie ropes you in with charm, challenge, and a whole lot of hogs.
70010000094973.intro: Wrangle piggies in this wild west puzzle adventure!
70010000094973.name: Hogtie

70010000097479.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Buk-ri Dock, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
High-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000097479.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Buk-ri Dock

70010000097637.description:
Fiz and the Rainbow Planet is a 2.5D pixel-art action game where you switch between characters as the situation demands to overcome challenges. One of the game’s standout features is the “Dimensional Sanctuary” , which offers a unique experience of progressing through a three-dimensional space while maintaining the look and feel of classic 2D gameplay. 


Story

Somewhere in the vast universe lies Planet Longa. One night, a young dragon named Fiz had a disturbing dream. The world had turned grey, and all life stood still, frozen in time. It was a terrifying vision of a lifeless future. When Fiz wakes up, he is visited by Taonga, a mysterious and all-knowing dragon, who reveals that the dream was more than just a nightmare. It was a glimpse of a possible future. To prevent this grim fate, Fiz must join forces with Taonga and five other dragons. Together, the seven must protect the sacred orbs scattered across the world. Determined to save his world, Fiz sets off on a grand adventure to find his companions and change the future.
70010000097637.intro: Guide unique little dragons using only three buttons as they run around. Dive into a pixel-art 2.5D action adventure that bends the rules of dimension!
70010000097637.name: Fiz and the Rainbow Planet

70050000055074.description:
Photo mode in ISLANDERS: New Shores allows you to immortalise your highest scoring island, or show the world your island empire you spent hours in Sanbox mode to make. This pack brings 10 more unique filters to give your screenshots a whole new look. 

Included Filters:
- VHS
- Water Color
- Ink
- Cross Hatch
- Kuwahara
- ASCII
- Kaleidoscope
- BUILD
- Vaporwave
- Ghost Vision
70050000055074.intro: Add new layers to photo mode with 10 fresh filters to capture the moment with.
70050000055074.name: ISLANDERS: New Shores - Photo Filter Pack

70070000028351.description:
Experience both ISLANDERS: New Shores and ISLANDERS (classic) with the Island Hopping Bundle. From the first in the series that introduced a relaxed atmosphere to city building, to the follow up which builds on the foundations adding new depth and replyability.

Included:

ISLANDERS: New Shores - Build your island retreat in a calm, minimalist world with exciting new features that keep the classic charm while inspiring fresh creativity.

ISLANDERS (Classic) - A minimalist strategy game about building cities on colorful islands. Explore an infinite number of ever-changing new lands, expand your settlements from sprawling villages to vast cities and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere.
70070000028351.intro: Explore an infinite number of ever-changing new lands across both games.
70070000028351.name: ISLANDERS: New Shores - Island Hopping Bundle

70070000028352.description:
Explore everything the ISLANDERS series has to offer, see infinite isles and capture the moment in style.

Included:

ISLANDERS: New Shores - Build your island retreat in a calm, minimalist world with exciting new features that keep the classic charm while inspiring fresh creativity.

ISLANDERS (Classic) - A minimalist strategy game about building cities on colorful islands. Explore an infinite number of ever-changing new lands, expand your settlements from sprawling villages to vast cities and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere.

ISLANDERS: New Shores Photo Filter Pack - Add new layers to photo mode with 10 fresh filters to capture the moment with.
70070000028352.intro: Explore everything the ISLANDERS series has to offer.
70070000028352.name: ISLANDERS: New Shores - The Full Archipelago Bundle

70070000028717.description:
Explore infinite new shores and capture the moments in style with ISLANDERS: New Shores and 10 Photo Mode Filters.

Included:

ISLANDERS: New Shores - Build your island retreat in a calm, minimalist world with exciting new features that keep the classic charm while inspiring fresh creativity.

ISLANDERS: New Shores Photo Filter Pack - Add new layers to photo mode with 10 fresh filters to capture the moment with.
70070000028717.intro: Explore infinite new shores and capture the moments in style.
70070000028717.name: ISLANDERS: New Shores - The Scenic Builders Pack

70010000083035.description:
Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4. Everything you loved is back, but revamped with more skaters, new parks, gnarlier tricks, eardrum shattering music, plus a whole lot more.

- Reunite the crew with cross-platform online Multiplayer* for up to 8 skaters in new and returning game modes.
- Drop in to new parks or tear it up across the timeless parks from both Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 & Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 4, authentically remade in jaw dropping HD resolution with streamlined goals and the epic 2-minute format.
- Hit ‘em with some drip in the expanded Create-A-Skater and Create-A-Park modes, including the ability to create custom goals to share with friends for the first time ever.
- Shred harder than ever with more challenging goals and an enhanced New Game+ mode.
- Whether you’re a total casual or a grungy pro, the same smooth handling and simple-to-learn controls from Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 will have you shredding like a Pro.

Alert the neighborhood watch and grab your skate buddies because the shred’s not dead. It’s back and better than ever.
70010000083035.intro: Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4.
70010000083035.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4

70010000088390.description:
PATAPON is an action adventure where players use the rhythm of 4 Mystical Drums to command cute and mysterious eyeball-like creatures known as Patapons.

All Patapons have unique characteristics and classes (jobs) such as the Hatapon who stands in the center of the squadron waving its flag and leading its allies, the Tatepon who protects others with its large shield, and the Yumipon who attacks by shooting arrows. The role of each Patapon during battle varies with their class, allowing you to create a unique and well-rounded army to take on the various challenges that await!
As the player, you are the God of the Patapons and lead them on a grand adventure to Earthend!

1) PATAPON and PATAPON 2 are now a packaged set!
The two games, released in 2007 and 2008, are back as a remastered set!

2) The game involves 2 elements: simple controls and strategic combat!
The controls are incredibly simple, comprised of the rhythmic beating of four drums [Pata(←), Pon(→), Don(↓), Chaka(↑)].

At the same time, there are many strategic elements, such as using the right battle commands during the right situation, and creating an army comprised of the classes (jobs) of Patapons, creating a game that is easy to understand while still offering a challenge!

3) A Game full of Challenges and Variety!
Patapons can be made or enhanced using various items. On top of that, even stronger Patapons can be created by gathering materials from stages and minigames. The game contains 400 weapons and equipment to enhance and upgrade your Patapons!
Customize your army to your heart’s content and create a one-of-a-kind squadron to take on the various enemies and challenges this game has to offer!

4) New support features!
While the original game elements remain unchanged, new support features have been added for a more enjoyable gaming experience!
Newly implemented features found in this version allow players to adjust the standard difficulty between Easy, Normal, and Hard, adjust the timing of button presses, and keep the drum icon displayed at all times!
Enjoy the original PATAPON, made better with all-new features!
70010000088390.intro: Bang Your Drums!! And Catch the Fever!!!
70010000088390.name: PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY

70010000095085.description:
Bendy and the Dark Revival® is a first-person survival horror game and the much anticipated sequel to Bendy and the Ink Machine®. Play as Audrey as she explores the depths of a curiously creepy animation studio that’s gone completely mad. Combat ink-tainted enemies, solve puzzles, and evade the ever-lurking Ink Demon while seeking your way back to the real world. You never know who or what is going to be around the next corner in this dilapidated realm of shadows and ink. 

Discover the truth. Escape the studio. Above all, fear the Ink Demon…and survive.
70010000095085.intro: The inky sequel to the cult classic. Survive the Ink Demon.
70010000095085.name: Bendy and the Dark Revival

70010000098340.description:
Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4. Everything you loved is back, but revamped with more skaters, new parks, gnarlier tricks, eardrum shattering music, plus a whole lot more.

- Reunite the crew with cross-platform online Multiplayer* for up to 8 skaters in new and returning game modes.
- Drop in to new parks or tear it up across the timeless parks from both Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 & Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 4, authentically remade in jaw dropping HD resolution with streamlined goals and the epic 2-minute format.
- Hit ‘em with some drip in the expanded Create-A-Skater and Create-A-Park modes, including the ability to create custom goals to share with friends for the first time ever.
- Shred harder than ever with more challenging goals and an enhanced New Game+ mode.
- Whether you’re a total casual or a grungy pro, the same smooth handling and simple-to-learn controls from Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 will have you shredding like a Pro.
- The Nintendo Switch™ 2 version of the game will feature higher resolution, improved frame rates and HDR support.

Alert the neighborhood watch and grab your skate buddies because the shred’s not dead. It’s back and better than ever.
70010000098340.intro: Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4.
70010000098340.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4

70010000099854.description:
Step into the exciting world of high-stakes poker with 3 Card Poker, a thrilling single-player card game experience, exclusively on Nintendo Switch™! Enjoy the fast-paced action of one of the most popular casino games, now beautifully reimagined with brilliant graphics and immersive sound design.

Test your luck and strategy against the dealer in this classic poker variant. Whether you're a poker pro or just learning the ropes, touch-screen controls and smooth gameplay make it easy to jump in and enjoy.

Key Features:

Stunning visuals and lifelike casino atmosphere

Authentic sound effects for a fully immersive experience

Play with virtual currency — no real money or in-app purchases required

Perfect for quick sessions or long play sessions alike


Deal yourself into the action—3 Card Poker is your ticket to poker fun anytime you want, with no strings attached!
70010000099854.name: 3 Card Poker

70050000053139.description:
This Pack includes:

- The Doom Slayer and The Revenant playable skaters, each includes 2 secret moves. The Doom Slayer includes 2 unique outfits and the Unmaykr Hoverboard skate deck.
- Additional songs included with the game soundtrack
- Exclusive Doom Slayer, Revenant, and Create-a-Skater skate decks 
- Exclusive themed Create-a-Skater Items
70050000053139.intro: This Pack contains Deluxe Edition Content.
70050000053139.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 - Deluxe Edition Content

70050000055206.description: Give your in-game Tony Hawk character a premium upgrade with this shader, adding a kaleidoscopic glow to your skating experience.
70050000055206.intro: Give your in-game Tony Hawk character a premium upgrade with this shader.
70050000055206.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 - Wireframe Tony Shader

70050000055207.description: This Pack contains content for Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4.
70050000055207.intro: This Pack contains content for Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4.
70050000055207.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 - Content Pack

70070000025382.description:
Pre-purchase and receive:

- Wireframe Tony Shader

Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4. Everything you loved is back, but revamped with more skaters, new parks, gnarlier tricks, eardrum shattering music, plus a whole lot more.

- Reunite the crew with cross-platform online Multiplayer* for up to 8 skaters in new and returning game modes.
- Drop in to new parks or tear it up across the timeless parks from both Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 & Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 4, authentically remade in jaw dropping HD resolution with streamlined goals and the epic 2-minute format.
- Hit ‘em with some drip in the expanded Create-A-Skater and Create-A-Park modes, including the ability to create custom goals to share with friends for the first time ever.

- Whether you’re a total casual or a grungy pro, the same smooth handling and simple-to-learn controls from Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 will have you shredding like a Pro.

Alert the neighborhood watch and grab your skate buddies because the shred’s not dead. It’s back and better than ever.
70070000025382.intro: Get hyped for the legendary franchise to return with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4.
70070000025382.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 - Standard Edition

70010000076845.description:
A dark force sweeps over Faerûn, ravaging everything in its path as though searching for something – something that you now find in your possession. As the Shard-Bearer, only you can stop the King of Shadows and his army from desecrating the land you call home. Will you save Faerûn, or fall victim to the temptation of absolute power?

When your actions dictate the fate of the Realms, there are no small choices.

Includes All Expansions:
- Mask of the Betrayer: Cursed with an insatiable hunger only quelled by devouring spirits, the Shard-Bearer must travel to the Shadow Realm to unearth the cause of this dark affliction.

- Storm of Zehir:  You and your crew are shipwrecked on the shores of a hostile jungle nation. Fighting your way back to civilization, you uncover a plot threatening to change Faerûn forever.

- Mysteries of Westgate: Beware the city of Westgate, where anything goes and everything has a price. Explore and expose the secrets hidden deep in the city’s underbelly before they consume you.

*Key Features*

Gather Your Party: Assemble a team of your friends across any and all platforms with fully supported crossplay. Together, embark on an epic journey governed by the Dungeons & Dragons 3.5 ruleset.

Become a Legend: Make your mark on the Realms as you play your way through over 100 hours of immersive gameplay and four unique campaigns, each as expansive as the Bag of Holding.

A Relic, Restored: Everything you loved about Neverwinter Nights 2 has been preserved. Enjoy smoother gameplay with refined camera controls, polished mechanics, enhanced textures, and full controller support with a newly designed controller-specific UI.
70010000076845.intro:
The Fate of The Forgotten Realms is in Your Hands 
Return to the city of Neverwinter in Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Nights 2: Enhanced Edition.
70010000076845.name: Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Nights 2: Enhanced Edition

70010000085206.description:
In a dark and dystopian cyberpunk future, food is the ultimate symbol of wealth and status. Using a revolutionary invention called Neon Noodles, the Aristocracy indulges their every culinary whim. Everyone else begs for scraps. With no memory and no name, you are just a cog in this machine. But when a mysterious message unlocks your forgotten past, it thrusts you into a daring, clandestine heist to seize control of Neon Noodles and reclaim your legacy.

Neon Noodles is an open-ended culinary themed machine-building puzzle game where you program robotic chefs to cook 250 recipes from around the world, consisting of 400 unique ingredients. Take on challenging assignments from a cast of intriguing clients and design complex and beautiful automations to uncover the truth behind the Neon Noodles. Do you have what it takes to pry humanity's future from the clutches of corporate greed?

Features:

• Design cooking machines using an intuitive record-and-replay system!
• Program robotic chefs to use 400 unique ingredients.
• Cook 250 recipes inspired by global cuisine!
• Tackle challenging assignments from a cast of memorable clients.
• Enjoy a dystopian narrative where food is both a valuable resource and status symbol!
70010000085206.intro: Design and program cooking machines in a dystopian future where food controls society!
70010000085206.name: Neon Noodles

70010000098543.description:
Why settle for ordinary cars when some are real treasures? Live the collector's dream!

Open your own collector car shop and make it an international success. Welcome car enthusiasts and help them find rare and special models. Create a place where fans feel at home!

Upgrade and style your shop. Turn a simple shop into a stunning space for collectors.

Organise everything - add smart features to make shopping easier. Create zones for buying, trading and displaying cars. Add space for the races and let the best win! 

Search for hidden gems and sell them to eager customers. Find rare cars to complete your collection! 

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Become the top collector car dealer and build a world-famous shop!
70010000098543.intro: Turn your passion for collecting cars into a successful business!
70010000098543.name: Collectible Cars Shop Simulator

70010000082516.description:
In a world where mysterious plants are spreading all over the earth, emitting toxic spores as they grow, a small group of survivors seeks shelter on the back of a giant, wandering creature they call 'Onbu'.
Become their leader, build their settlement and form a symbiotic relationship with Onbu to survive together in this hostile, yet beautiful post-apocalyptic world.

Build your village
A functioning village is the basis of your survival. Build your settlement and expand it over Onbu’s back. Plan production chains and optimise them to utilise the limited space as efficiently as possible. Create a society that can overcome any challenge.

Live on the creature’s back
Living on the back of another organism comes with its own set of challenges. Will you live in symbiosis, bond with Onbu and survive on mutual trust? Or will you become a parasite, only aiming to ensure a better life for your villagers? The choice is yours.

Discover different biomes
Continuously adapt your village as you travel through a multitude of different biomes, each with its unique climate zones, opportunities and threats. Scout your environments and send out foraging missions to gather rare resources and ancient artefacts. 

Research new technologies
Remnants of the old world hold knowledge that has long been forgotten, but can be unearthed by your villagers. Find and research these technologies, but use them wisely, as progress can be a double-edged sword.

Survive the wastelands
Ensure the survival of both your villagers and your Onbu, even though poisonous spores, merciless weather, bloodsucking parasites and many more challenges mean that the odds are often stacked against you.
70010000082516.intro: The Wandering Village is a city-building simulation game on the back of a giant, wandering creature. Build your settlement and form a symbiotic relationship with the colossus. Will you survive
70010000082516.name: The Wandering Village

70010000084028.description:
The first full-scale HUNTER×HUNTER fighting game is here!

■3v3 Nen ability team battle
Create teams of characters to face off in 3-on-3 battles.
Find a combination with synergy, and aim for the top with your own unique team!

■Rush combo
Just hold down the rush button and hit the button repeatedly to unleash powerful combos!
Feel the exhilarating rush of pulling off a combo with ease!

■Online battle
Face off against other players across the network to win rank points.
Your rank updates as you accumulate points. Aim to become a “three-star hunter”!
You can even compete with "G.I. Cards" at stake! Gather the cards for the specified slots!

■Story mode
Battle against CPU opponents as you enjoy a digest of beloved Hunter x Hunter moments!
This mode includes tutorial stages, so try it out first to understand the basics of how to play!
70010000084028.intro: The first full-scale HUNTER×HUNTER fighting game is here!!
70010000084028.name: HUNTER×HUNTER NEN×IMPACT

70010000086794.description:
A Fresh Twist to Turn-Based Strategy
Anomaly Collapse thrusts you into an innovative one-dimensional battlefield grid, where movements are minimized, but strategy is maximized. Plan your moves and outmaneuver your foes by mastering the art of flanking, backstabbing, and cornering them in thrilling face-offs!

Hundreds of Powerful Abnormalities
Equip your furry warriors with "abnormalities" – artifacts that possess active or passive effects. Delve into a vast collection of these power-ups scattered throughout the game, each with unique abilities. Leverage the power of these abnormalities at critical moments to turn the tide of battle, and mix and match them to craft the ultimate battle strategy!

A Furry Battalion of Savvy Warriors
Craft a team of adorable yet formidable furry fighters, each boasting distinct classes and powerful traits. With three slots available, your choices will make or break your strategy. Devise innovative ways to synergize their skills, strategize combinations, all while unlocking their intriguing backstories.

Expect the Unexpected
In Anomaly Collapse, the battlefield is ever-shifting. With abnormal being the new normal, be prepared for bizarre, challenging, and even comical events that will reshape the battlefield's dynamics in a flash. Make flexibility and swift decision-making your most trusted allies!
70010000086794.intro: Position First! Command the Plush Battalion to a Clutch Victory in Dynamic Combat Zones!
70010000086794.name: Anomaly Collapse

70010000094559.description:
Classic Loot-Based RPG: 9 unique classes × 9 weapon types × 600+ pieces of gear × 200+ pets × 180 relics. Mix and match freely to create your ultimate build!

Epic Adventure Awaits: Explore 6 distinct worlds and conquer 6 completely different loops. Enjoy over 50 hours of thrilling, loot-filled gameplay!
70010000094559.intro: Loot and roguelike thrills await. Begin your epic action RPG adventure!
70010000094559.name: God Wars

70010000096810.description:
Join the unlikely duo of Donkey Kong and Pauline as they smash their way through a vast underground world in Donkey Kong Bananza – only on Nintendo Switch 2.

This game supports Brazilian Portuguese.
70010000096810.name: Donkey Kong Bananza

70010000097948.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Pocheon-si, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
 high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000097948.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Pocheon-si

70050000056432.description: HUNTER x HUNTER NEN x IMPACT Season Pass Additional Costume “C”.
70050000056432.name: Season Pass 1 Limited Character Arrangement Costume（Chrollo）

70050000056433.description: The pre-order bonus for the HUNTER x HUNTER NEN x IMPACT Deluxe Edition is the “Gon Costume B Color 5”.
70050000056433.name: Pre-order bonus "Character color variation for Gon"

70010000077050.description:
Shadow Labyrinth is a 2D action platformer and a genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN.

As Swordsman No. 8, awoken by a floating yellow orb, PUCK, on a mysterious planet amidst relics of wars past, you are chosen to become the instrument of its will.

To survive you will discover many secrets, consume your enemies, and grow from prey to the apex predator as you embrace your true purpose.

Discover a World of Secrets
Search the remnants of an age-old intergalactic conflict, started long before your arrival, and discover new powers and abilities. Use them to traverse an alien world as you battle dangerous creatures and evolved monstrosities.

Become the Apex Predator
Master the fluid combat and combine powerful skills to create a playstyle of your own. Use different abilities to turn the tables on your enemies as you consume them and grow from prey to apex predator.

Embrace Your True Purpose
Team up with PUCK, and dive deeper into the maze of a mysterious alien world. Find out the truth behind your presence here, what does PUCK want, and why it chose you.
70010000077050.name: Shadow Labyrinth

70010000097157.description:
Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Includes:
• Shadow Labyrinth
• Shadow Labyrinth Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack
 
Shadow Labyrinth is a 2D action platformer and a genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN.
